headline: Passenger wears hazmat suit to airport for flight
content:
Submit 



		Thanks for contacting us. We've received your submission.	This hazmat suit is hazardous — to the eyes!A passenger at Dulles Airport near Washington, DC wasn’t taking any chances of catching Ebola, draping herself in what appeared to be a homemade, full-length plastic hazmat suit as she waited for her flight.Another flier took her photo and gave it to The Daily Caller.Thomas Eric Duncan, the first person to die from Ebola in the US, had a layover at Dulles last month while flying to Texas from West Africa.Share Selection
